name: 4cubes
description:
Motivation

4cubes was created for The Fall All-OGA Game JAM! 2018

Description

It is a puzzle game where you have to put 4 blocks in a row, vertically and horizontally.  For passing to the next level you have to destroy all the enemy's cubes or blocks represented by boxes and crates.

Story

In the factory of dreams  a machine has gone mad and now is mixin' all the christmas presents.

Meanwhile it's not getting repaired you must clean all the mess up,  for ensuring that the right packets arrive to the good girls and boys.

It's up to you !!

Enjoy it.

Age rating ( Everyone )
